entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
